statements: SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, total_funds_raised FROM fundraising_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM fundraising_campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_funds_raised FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE total_funds_raised > 5000
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns ORDER BY total_funds_raised DESC
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE total_funds_raised > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_funds_raised FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_funds_raised DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE total_funds_raised BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' AND total_funds_raised > 20000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_campaigns, SUM(total_funds_raised) AS total_raised FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fundraising_efforts;
SELECT campaign_name, total_goal FROM fundraising_efforts ORDER BY total_goal DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donor_contributions WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM donor_contributions WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, total_goal FROM fundraising_efforts WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_efforts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT campaign_name, total_goal FROM fundraising_efforts ORDER BY total_goal DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donor_contributions WHERE donation_date > '2022-04-15'
SELECT campaign_name, donor_name, donation_amount FROM fundraising_efforts JOIN donor_contributions ON fundraising_efforts.id = donor_contributions.campaign_id

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM fundraising_efforts JOIN donor_contributions ON fundraising_efforts.id = donor_contributions.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_donations DESC
SELECT * FROM fundraising_efforts;
SELECT campaign_name, total_funds_raised FROM fundraising_efforts WHERE total_funds_raised > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donor_contributions ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE total_donations_received < 500;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_efforts WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, total_funds_raised, start_date, end_date FROM fundraising_efforts;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date, campaign_id FROM donor_contributions;
SELECT campaign_name, total_donations_received, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_efforts WHERE total_funds_raised > 10000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, campaign_name FROM donor_contributions JOIN fundraising_efforts ON donor_contributions.campaign_id = fundraising_efforts.id;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_efforts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM fundraising_efforts ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 123;
SELECT campaign_name, target_amount FROM campaigns WHERE target_amount > 1000 ORDER BY target_amount ASC;
SELECT donation_id, amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE amount >= 50 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_efforts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT donation_id, amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_amount FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY target_amount DESC;
SELECT fundraising_efforts.id, fundraising_efforts.campaign_name, donors.donor_name FROM fundraising_efforts JOIN donors ON fundraising_efforts.id = donors.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 2;
SELECT donation_id, amount FROM donations ORDER BY donated_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_goals WHERE goal_amount > 5000;
SELECT donor_id, campaign_id, amount FROM donations WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, phone_number, address FROM donors WHERE donor_id IN (SELECT donor_id FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000);
SELECT campaign_name, goal_amount, goal_description FROM fundraising_goals WHERE goal_amount > 5000 ORDER BY goal_amount ASC;
